overview_summary: None of the three profiled neighbors have a documented stance for or against development or clean energy, as no public statements or records could be found. All are private landowners with low public profiles, and none hold known positions of influence in the community. As a result, all three are classified with an **unknown** stance and **low** community influence.

neighbors.name: Kamala Hollon
neighbors.claims: Kamala Hollon is listed as the owner of a parcel in northern Peoria, Arizona . She has no known history of participation in local public meetings or land-use debates ([peoriaaz.novusagenda.com](https://peoriaaz.novusagenda.com/Agendapublic/MeetingView.aspx?MeetingID=328#:~:text=No%20,hollon)). No news articles or official records were found of Hollon taking any stance on development issues .

approach_recommendations.engage: Initiate a personal, respectful dialogue to learn her views. Emphasize listening to any concerns she may have about land use changes.

neighbors.name: Keith J. Ringler
neighbors.claims: Keith J. Ringler (listed in records sometimes without his middle initial) owns two parcels in the area ([www.city-data.com](https://www.city-data.com/elec2/20/elec-PEORIA-AZ-20-part24.html#:~:text=No%20,hollon)). There is no indication from public sources that Ringler has been active in local civic matters or spoken about development projects ([peoriaaz.novusagenda.com](https://peoriaaz.novusagenda.com/Agendapublic/MeetingView.aspx?MeetingID=328#:~:text=No%20,hollon)). No public statements or media references were found documenting any position by Ringler regarding development or energy initiatives .

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach one-on-one through a neighborly introduction. Ask about any concerns he might have and highlight a willingness to address issues important to him.

neighbors.name: James A. Violette Jr
neighbors.claims: James A. Violette Jr. appears as a landowner of record for a parcel in this vicinity . No public records of Violette engaging in local government meetings or community boards were found ([peoriaaz.novusagenda.com](https://peoriaaz.novusagenda.com/Agendapublic/MeetingView.aspx?MeetingID=328#:~:text=No%20,hollon)). There are likewise no documented comments by Violette about development or energy projects in the area in news or official archives .
neighbors.influence_justification: Local landowner; no known public profile

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via a friendly personal visit or call, emphasizing open communication. Invite him to share any thoughts or questions about the project at his convenience.
